Truth Essence.quote: "Truth is one, paths are many." (Mahatma Gandhi)

Eternal Truth.quote: "Heaven and earth will pass away, but my words will never pass away." (Matthew 24:35)

Truth Nature.quote: "Truth is that which doesn't change." (Yoga Sutras of Patanjali 1.13)

Ultimate Reality.quote: "The Real cannot be new, the Real cannot be destroyed." (Bhagavad Gita 2:16)

Truth Revelation.quote: "And you shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free." (John 8:32)

Divine Wisdom.quote: "Wisdom is radiant and unfading." (Wisdom of Solomon 6:12)

Truth Consciousness.quote: "Truth is the dwelling place of the Eternal." (Upanishads)

Sacred Knowledge.quote: "Knowledge is the wing wherewith we fly to Heaven." (Shakespeare, Henry VI)

Truth Path.quote: "I am the way, the truth, and the life." (John 14:6)

Absolute Truth.quote: "There is nothing higher than Truth." (Mundaka Upanishad 3.1.6)

Truth Principles.quote: "The truth of truths is love." (Meister Eckhart)

Truth Manifestation.quote: "Truth manifests itself in various forms to different seekers." (Ramakrishna)

Divine Understanding.quote: "Understanding is the reward of faith." (Augustine of Hippo)

Truth Recognition.quote: "The eye through which I see God is the same eye through which God sees me." (Meister Eckhart)

Eternal Law.quote: "The Dharma is the eternal law that upholds the universe." (Buddha)

Truth Experience.quote: "Experience of Truth is beyond mind and speech." (Ramana Maharshi)

Divine Light.quote: "God is light, and in Him there is no darkness at all." (1 John 1:5)

Truth Realization.quote: "Self-realization is the knowing in all parts of body, mind, and soul that you are now in possession of the kingdom of God." (Paramahansa Yogananda)

Sacred Truth.quote: "Every sacred truth is the living power of God." (Emanuel Swedenborg)

Truth Essence.quote: "Truth is the substance of all existence." (Swami Vivekananda)

Divine Word.quote: "In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God." (John 1:1)

Eternal Wisdom.quote: "Wisdom was with God from the beginning." (Proverbs 8:22)

Truth Vision.quote: "When the eye is unobstructed, the result is sight." (Lao Tzu)

Divine Knowledge.quote: "Knowledge of Truth is knowledge of God." (Al-Ghazali)

Sacred Presence.quote: "The kingdom of God is within you." (Luke 17:21)

Truth Identity.quote: "Truth is the soul of existence." (Sri Aurobindo)

Divine Revelation.quote: "Every divine revelation is the unveiling of deep truth." (Paul Tillich)

Truth Reality.quote: "Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one." (Albert Einstein)

Purpose of Creation.quote: I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me. (Quran 51:56)

Divine Will.quote: Not my will, but Yours be done. (Luke 22:42)

Cosmic Plan.quote: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope. (Jeremiah 29:11)

Sacred Design.quote: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God. (John 1:1)

Divine Purpose.quote: Everything has been created with a purpose. (Bhagavad Gita 3:42)

Universal Order.quote: The Tao gave birth to One, One gave birth to Two, Two gave birth to Three, Three gave birth to all things. (Tao Te Ching 42)

Divine Direction.quote: Allah intends for you ease and does not intend for you hardship. (Quran 2:185)

Sacred Movement.quote: As above, so below; as within, so without. (Hermes Trismegistus, Emerald Tablet)

Eternal Purpose.quote: From Him and through Him and to Him are all things. (Romans 11:36)

Divine Wisdom.quote: But wisdom is justified by all her children. (Luke 7:35)

Sacred Evolution.quote: All things work together for good to those who love God. (Romans 8:28)

Divine Guidance.quote: Guide us to the straight path. (Quran 1:6)

Cosmic Intent.quote: The universe is not only queerer than we suppose, but queerer than we can suppose. (J.B.S. Haldane)

Sacred Flow.quote: The wind blows where it wishes, and you hear its sound, but you do not know where it comes from or where it goes. (John 3:8)

Divine Plan.quote: For everything there is a season, and a time for every matter under heaven. (Ecclesiastes 3:1)

Universal Law.quote: As you sow, so shall you reap. (Galatians 6:7)

Sacred Time.quote: To everything there is a season, and a time to every purpose under heaven. (Ecclesiastes 3:1)

Divine Orchestration.quote: In all your ways acknowledge Him, and He will make straight your paths. (Proverbs 3:6)

Cosmic Purpose.quote: The purpose of life is to investigate things and know them. (Aristotle, Metaphysics)

Divine Harmony.quote: Everything in the universe is within you. Ask all from yourself. (Rumi)

Divine Order.quote: Order is heaven's first law. (Alexander Pope)

Universal Balance.quote: For every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction. (Karma principle)

Sacred Mission.quote: Go therefore and make disciples of all nations. (Matthew 28:19)

Divine Causation.quote: Nothing happens without a cause. (Buddhist principle of Dependent Origination)

Eternal Design.quote: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you. (Jeremiah 1:5)

Sacred Purpose.quote: Let us make mankind in our image, in our likeness. (Genesis 1:26)

Divine Unfoldment.quote: He has made everything beautiful in its time. (Ecclesiastes 3:11)

Cosmic Direction.quote: The path of the just is as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day. (Proverbs 4:18)

Divine Blueprint.quote: Your eyes saw my unformed substance; in your book were written, every one of them, the days that were formed for me. (Psalm 139:16)
